data.title: overpriced for smaller then normal peices.
data.text:
they actually get 9 pieces of chicken from a bird. 
 as they charge per piece. so I guess cutting them into many tiny pieces and charging like it's Lobster is ok in their book..
 Bring back BOSTON Market, or Kenny Rogers Roasters.

data.title: I'm not liking their new menu selections but the taste is ok
data.text: Still great chicken, mashed potato's and gravy. I like to sub for the french fries.  I preferred their old menu which allowed you to chose the number of pieces of chicken and sides. Now they are "boxes".  Hope it's working out for them, it's not for me.
